questions.quote: See, the great thing about robbing a fat guy is it's an easy getaway. You know? They can't really chase ya!
Would you believe when I was 18, I had a ssssilver dollar collection?
Well, you had a good run, what was it 75, 80 years? Wreaking havoc, making everybody nervous.
George, I just got off a twenty-three hour plane ride. I'm too tired to even vomit at the thought.
Four hundred dollars? What are you nuts? Someone will pay more.
I didn't want to tell you this, but usually he hates everyone.
Well, there was so much snow. The roads were closed. I really appreciate it - you picking me up. Thanks again.
Hey, what's another million, give or take. I get off where and when I wanna get off.
I can't believe you told Kramer it's okay to put the cable in during the shower! Jerry, look,, look! They've eaten everything.
The point is I'm going to be taking this lie detector test and that needle's going to be going wild.
